import { useState, useCallback } from "react" import { Card, Button, TextField, Form, FormLayout } from "@shopify/polaris" import { useForm } from "react-hook-form" import { useLogin } from "../core/hooks" const Profile = React.forwardRef(({ setUser }, ref) => { const { handleSubmit, errors, register } = useForm() const { login, isLoading, data } = useLogin() console.log("Data from useLogin hook", data) return (
{errors.username &&

{errors.username.message}

} {errors.password &&

{errors.password.message}

} {/* {errors.username &&

{errors.username.message}

} {errors.password &&

{errors.password.message}

} */}
) }) export default Profile
